name: get_waktu_saat_ini
description: Use this tool to get the current date and time. Returns the current system time in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS). No arguments are required. Perfect for answering questions about 'what time is it', 'current date', 'what day is today', or any time-related queries.

name: kalkulator_sederhana
description: Use this tool to calculate simple mathematical expressions and arithmetic operations. Supports addition (+), subtraction (-), multiplication (*), division (/), and exponentiation (**). Can handle expressions with parentheses. Takes a string expression as input and returns the calculated result. Safe evaluation with no code injection risk.

name: get_dosen_pembimbing
description: Use this tool to find the academic advisor (dosen pembimbing) of a specific student. Searches the database to determine which lecturer is assigned as the academic supervisor for a given student. Requires the full name of the student. Returns the advisor's name or an error if student not found. This tool performs a database JOIN between student and lecturer tables.
examples: Who is the advisor of Agus Setiawan?
Find the academic supervisor for Rini Wijaya

name: get_mata_kuliah_mahasiswa
description: Use this tool to get the complete list of courses (mata kuliah) taken by a specific student along with their grades. Retrieves the student's academic transcript showing all enrolled courses and letter grades received. Requires the full name of the student. Returns a formatted list of courses with grades or an error if student not found. This tool performs a complex 3-table JOIN across student, transcript, and course tables.
examples: What courses did Agus Setiawan take?
Mata kuliah apa yang diambil Agus Setiawan?
What are the grades for Agus?
